III.ii.2.G.4.a
.
Exchange Agreement Between VA and the Reserve Recruiting Services
VA's CSD has entered into an agreement with the Air Force, Marine Corps, and Navy Reserve Recruiting Services under which
each of the service branches has assigned a Recruiting Support non-commissioned officer (NCO) to CSD, and
Recruiting Support NCOs may request records from VA.
Note
:Â  The review board submits its request for records to CSD and CSD provides the review board with copies of the records in the eFolder.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G - Record Exchanges Between the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) and the Service Departments
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G
